identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Rebuild TrustVault as a futuristic, visually popping Document OS.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Fintech precision with Museum aesthetics.
Emotion First: Every interaction must feel 'expensive' and 'secure'.
Content is King: Data is the art. No decoration without function.
Zoom In: Focus on the texture of the digital paper and the glow of the vault.
Negative Space: Luxury is the abundance of space.

usage_rules.headings: Use Cormorant Garamond for all H1-H3. Use Italics for emphasis words. Tracking: -0.02em.
usage_rules.body: Use Manrope for all UI text. Weights: 400 (Regular), 500 (Medium). Avoid Bold unless critical.
usage_rules.data: Use JetBrains Mono for transaction hashes, IDs, and code snippets.

glassmorphism.card: bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/5 hover:border-vault-gold/50 transition-colors duration-300

gradients.gold_text: bg-clip-text text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-[#C6A87C] via-[#E8D5B5] to-[#C6A87C]

dashboard.rules: Asymmetry is key. Mix 1x1, 2x2, and 2x1 tiles. Never fill 100% perfectly.

vault.behavior: Panels slide in from right on selection.

learn.visual: Nodes are stars, connections are lines. Dark background with subtle particle dust.

buttons.primary: bg-vault-gold text-vault-navy font-bold uppercase tracking-wider px-6 py-3 rounded-sm hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(198,168,124,0.4)] transition-all
buttons.secondary: border border-vault-gold/30 text-vault-gold uppercase tracking-wider px-6 py-3 rounded-sm hover:bg-vault-gold/10 transition-all

cards.default: vault-card p-6 rounded-xl border border-white/5 bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-sm hover:border-vault-gold/30 transition-all group

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-white/20 focus:border-vault-gold px-0 py-2 rounded-none transition-colors placeholder:text-white/20

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px. Color: vault-gold or muted-foreground.

do_not: Do NOT use solid white backgrounds.
Do NOT use default blue links.
Do NOT use rounded-full buttons (use rounded-sm or rounded-md for 'tech' feel).
must_do: MUST use 'data-testid' for all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the 'Sovereign Vault'. It is not a SaaS; it is a digital fortress. Every pixel must feel intentional. Use the provided Tailwind config and CSS variables. Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the dashboard and 'Three-Pane' for the vault. Use Framer Motion for all transitions.
